metadata.title: CVE-2023-4911 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - high
metadata.description: A buffer overflow was discovered in the GNU C Library's dynamic loaderld.so while processing the GLIBC_TUNABLES environment variable. This issuecould allow a local attacker to use maliciously crafted GLIBC_TUNABLESenvironment variables when launching binaries with SUID permission toexecute code with elevated privileges.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
